Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy, Ectopic/Pregnancy, Abdominal
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A type of ectopic pregnancy in which the EMBRYO, MAMMALIAN implants in the ABDOMINAL CAVITY instead of in the ENDOMETRIUM of the UTERUS.
